pullRequest.body:
We can reduce the imports of this file if we move some lemmas downstream. ~~I'm not sure how much this change is worth it, since we have to add extra imports to `PrincipalIdealDomain`: is the bump going to be big?~~ It's a -137 / 50% reduction for definition of euclidean domains and a few downstream files, and a +1 / +0.1% increase for `PrincipalIdealDomain` and a lot of downstream files: I think that's definitely worth it. (Especially if we can split `PrincipalIdealDomain` later on.)

---
